column5: You have to go get a copy of todays Toronto Sun you will not believe the picture on the front page of the sports pullout I would swear if you covered the jersey it would be PAUl hands down. I have looked on line and i cant find it so you will have to buy the paper I swear you will not believe your eyes!!!!!!!!  Peter
Hey Peter, I haven't had a chance to read my paper yet, but its sitting at home.  I'll take a look after work.  Thanks hon.  Joey
